::KitKat::

"Can you not see the possibilities? Simple, you have the clone go 
into battle, while you sit at the base, safe and sound.  If the clone 
is killed, then you are still safe. Now, is there any flaw with that 
logic?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron looked at the imposter from head to toe. It turns out 
Nighteyes 
> wasnt wrong.....
>     "Well, I like to see my former minions carring on my legacy. 
But I think 
> you might have over done it." He trailed off and then lost his 
smile. "And 
> how do you plan on using it?" For the moment, he held in his pure 
hate and 
> rage.
